summary: Adds 2 new Two Handed Hammers to the Daedric Crafting List.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz359/kamuiius/DaedricSkullHammersLogo.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][color=#FF0000][b]Daedric Skull Hammers[/b][/color][/center]
[center][color=#FF0000]By Rendalli[/color][/center]

Description:
Adds 2 new two-handed hammer to the daedric crafting list.
Daedric Skull Hammer and Daedric Skull Maul.
You need to have the daedric smithing perk to craft them.
They can be Enchanted and Tempered.
They are equivalent to the regular Daedric Warhammer.

Daedric Skull Hammer takes 5 Ebony Ingots, 3 Leather Strips, 1 Daedra Heart, and 2 Skulls to craft at any Anvil.

Daedric Skull Maul takes 5 Ebony Ingots, 3 Leather Strips, 1 Daedra Heart, and 1 Skull to craft at any Anvil.


These were made from parts of vanilla items.  They use textures from the vanilla Daedric Warhammer so any daedric texture replacer should work with them.  They also use the vanilla Skull textures so any mod that retextures skulls should work with them as well.

Update History:
0.1 added Daedric Skull Hammer High Poly Optional.
0.2 Added Daedrick Skull Maul.  merged high poly mesh\'s into this version.
0.2 Added Alternate Mainfile that Removes the Jawbone from the Hammer. 

Installation:
Unzip into the game\'s Data folder.

Updting to New Versions:
Unzip into the Game\'s Data folder and overwrite when prompted.

Uninstall:
Delete Daedric Skull Hammers.esp and Daedric Skull Hammers.bsa from the game\'s Data folder.

Here are some nice Textures if you want a different look for the skulls:

More Bony Skeletons and HD skeleton clutter by jerminator (i use the grimey and aged version)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11219

Death Skeletons 4096x4096 Texture BY GameNinjaPro 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6147

Here are some nice Textures if you want a different look for the Daedric part of the weapon:

Daedric Armor and weapon Improvement by GarryG
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3104

Credits:
Bethesda for an awesome game.
Autodesk for 3DS Max 2012 & 2013.
author: Rendalli
